def max_sum_subarray(arr, k, m):
    n = len(arr)
    max_sum = float('-inf')
    left = 1
    right = m - 1
    while right < n:
        current_sum = sum(arr[left:right + 1])
        if current_sum < k and any((num < 0 for num in arr[left:right + 1])):
            max_sum = max(max_sum, current_sum)
        left += 1
        right += 1
    return max_sum
